profiles.name: Emily Chen
special_requests: Adjust table for one more person
Details on the gluten-free amuse-bouche
profiles.staff_notes: Guest appreciates personal conversation and dislikes crowded environments. Ensure a comfortable and personal dining experience.

profiles.name: David Martinez
special_requests: Private dining area
Special amuse-bouches
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers a confidential atmosphere and enjoys discussing football, specifically the 49ers. He appreciates good wine pairings and special surprises from the chef, such as a course featuring truffles.

profiles.name: Karen Wu
special_requests: Wheelchair accessible table
Small surprise for mother's birthday
Fruity dessert for mother
profiles.staff_notes: Guest's mother uses a wheelchair. Ensure the table is easy to navigate to. Prepare a small surprise for her 70th birthday, preferably a fruity dessert. The guest is a Yankees fan and enjoys talking about baseball.

profiles.name: Peter Glover
special_requests: Ensure no walnuts in any dish
profiles.staff_notes: Guest had a negative experience at another restaurant due to walnut allergy. Ensure kitchen staff is aware and takes necessary precautions.

profiles.name: Sylvia Brown
special_requests: Recommendations for a celebratory champagne or dessert
profiles.staff_notes: Guest appreciates creative plant-based dishes and has a preference for well-seasoned food. She also values direct feedback requests from the team.

profiles.name: Alicia Martin
special_requests: Arrange a small note on the dessert plate that says 'I love you'
profiles.staff_notes: Guest appreciates attentive service and warm hospitality. Ensure food is served hot and promptly. She also enjoys learning about the food she's eating, as noted in her positive review of a sushi demonstration.

profiles.name: Benjamin Cruz
special_requests: Kid-friendly menu or half portions for teenage niece
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers authentic flavors and is not fond of overly sweet sauces. He appreciates attentive and informative waitstaff. The guest may find loud environments disruptive to conversation.

profiles.name: Chelsea Wright
special_requests: Bring their own mini cake or restaurant arranged special cake
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers larger portion sizes and well-cooked food. Ensure service is organized and efficient.
conversation: Discuss their experience at Truffle Garden and Don’s Dumpling House

profiles.name: Dylan Hayes
special_requests: Small toast or something celebratory at the end
profiles.staff_notes: Guest appreciates well-cooked meat and quick service. Has a preference for French cuisine.

profiles.name: Eve Olsen
special_requests: Non-alcoholic options for celebratory toast
Scenic spots for photos
profiles.staff_notes: Guest appreciates attentive service and variety in food options. Ensure to offer a variety of toppings or accompaniments.
conversation: Guest's interest in fresh and varied food options

profiles.name: Felix Novak
special_requests: Dairy-free options
profiles.staff_notes: Guest appreciates well-paired drinks and fresh food. Ensure all dishes and drinks are served at the correct temperature.

profiles.name: Gina Parker
special_requests: Small rose on the table
profiles.staff_notes: Guest has previously noted long wait times before order was taken. Ensure prompt service. Guest appreciates small details and gestures.
conversation: Ask about their experience at Hibachi Flame and the flaming onion volcano

profiles.name: Henry Cooper
profiles.special_occassion: Guest is planning to propose to his girlfriend
special_requests: Discreetly bring out the engagement ring on a dessert plate
profiles.staff_notes: Guest's girlfriend does not like big public scenes, keep the proposal subtle

profiles.name: Irene Roberts
profiles.special_occassion: Belated birthday celebration for guest's father
special_requests: Small birthday celebration with a candle in a chocolate dessert
profiles.staff_notes: Guest appreciates good tea and strong coffee. Dislikes weak coffee.
conversation: Guest's interest in noodles and donuts

profiles.name: Jacob Perez
special_requests: Wheelchair accessibility
Step-free entrance
profiles.staff_notes: Guest's father-in-law uses a wheelchair. Ensure the entrance is step-free and the table is easily accessible. The guest prefers less spicy food.

profiles.name: Julie Wilson
special_requests: Secluded corner table
Recommendations for starters
profiles.staff_notes: Guest has previously complained about lukewarm food. Ensure all dishes are served at the correct temperature. Guest appreciates spicy food, particularly Indian cuisine.
conversation: Ask about her recent experiences at other restaurants
Discuss Indian cuisine and spicy foods

profiles.name: Kara Thompson
special_requests: Add a 'Congratulations!' topper to any dessert
profiles.staff_notes: Guest has previously noted slow service and lack of coffee refills. Ensure prompt service and regular check-ins for this reservation.
conversation: Guest enjoys a variety of grilled meats and veggies, and has a preference for memorable marinades
Guest's husband recently passed a big exam

profiles.name: Lance Ramirez
special_requests: Permission to take professional-level photos of the dishes
profiles.staff_notes: Guest appreciates rich flavors and well-prepared food. He also values pleasant staff interactions. Ensure the toppings on his dishes are secure and won't slide off.

profiles.name: Maria Brooks
special_requests: Ensure food is not too spicy
profiles.staff_notes: Guest appreciates when staff engage in conversation about local events and culture. Ensure food is well-prepared and served promptly.

profiles.name: Noah Davis
special_requests: Quiet 'Happy Birthday' on a small dessert plate
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers no fuss for special occasions. Enjoyed a mini lesson on food last visit, might appreciate similar interactions.

profiles.name: Olivia Morris
special_requests: Low-key engagement announcement with two glasses of champagne
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers warm food and flavorful dishes, based on her review of Crepe Castle. She also appreciates energetic staff, as noted in her review of Fiesta Pizza.

profiles.name: Paula Nelson
special_requests: Arrive 15 minutes early
White wine pairing for escargots
profiles.staff_notes: Guest enjoys discussing travel, particularly Greece. Also shows interest in food pairings.

profiles.name: Quinn Stevens
special_requests: Special holiday menu preview
No nuts in the bisque
profiles.staff_notes: Guest is interested in unique flavors and imported ingredients. They were not impressed with underwhelming sides at a previous restaurant.

profiles.name: Rosalind Tucker
special_requests: Guest would like to bring a special bottle of wine
profiles.staff_notes: Ensure correct order is served and it's hot. Guest had a bad experience with wrong and lukewarm food at another restaurant.
conversation: Wine pairing with salmon en papillote

profiles.name: Steven Upton
profiles.special_occassion: Unknown, but guest has requested a box of macarons as a surprise for his wife, possibly indicating a celebration
special_requests: Pre-order a small box of macarons to present at the end of the meal
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers balanced flavors, not overly sweet. Enjoys fusion cuisine.

profiles.name: Tamara Valdez
special_requests: Modification of chef's tasting menu due to shellfish allergy
profiles.staff_notes: Guest has had mixed experiences at other restaurants, appreciates fresh ingredients and well-prepared food. Ensure all dishes, especially bread, are fresh.

profiles.name: Umar Watson
special_requests: Add a small note on the dessert plate saying '10 Years Strong'
No singing or big fuss
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers a quiet celebration and appreciates friendly staff. They have had mixed experiences with desserts in the past.
conversation: Guest enjoys a variety of banchan and bibimbap, indicating a preference for Korean cuisine

profiles.name: Valerie Xiu
special_requests: Permission to bring own flowers or request for flowers onsite
profiles.staff_notes: Guest appreciates fresh ingredients and attentive staff. Had a negative experience with unripe fruit and disinterested staff at another restaurant.
conversation: Guest's interest in fresh ingredients and customizable food options

profiles.name: Wendy Young
special_requests: Push two tables together or provide a round table for 6
Inquire about group discount or special group menu
profiles.staff_notes: Guest has a preference for well-seasoned food, particularly enjoyed unique cheddar-thyme loaf at a previous restaurant
conversation: Discuss the unique dishes of the restaurant

profiles.name: Xander Zimmerman
special_requests: Permission to photograph each course for food blog
profiles.staff_notes: Guest is a food blogger and prefers vegan dishes. Ensure the dishes are presented well as they will be photographed. Also, the guest has expressed dissatisfaction with portion sizes at other restaurants, so ensure portions are satisfactory.

profiles.name: Yara Richards
special_requests: Semi-private space for business discussion
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers less salty food, has a liking for artisanal cheese and specialty ciders

profiles.name: Zoe Baxter
special_requests: Niçoise to be prepared with absolutely no shellfish or fish sauce
profiles.staff_notes: Guest has a severe shellfish allergy. Ensure no cross-contamination in the kitchen. Avoid using fish sauce in any dish served to the guest.
conversation: Discuss their experience at other restaurants
Ask about their preference for coffee

profiles.name: Alex Cunningham
special_requests: Small surprise for girlfriend's birthday - miniature dessert with a candle
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers subtle celebrations. Enjoys variety in sauces and has an interest in smoking techniques.

profiles.name: Brianna Daniels
special_requests: Permission to take food photographs for Instagram
profiles.staff_notes: Guest is a food photographer and prefers authentic dishes. She does not appreciate loud music and greasy food.

profiles.name: Carlos Edwards
special_requests: Seating near piano or lounge area
profiles.staff_notes: Guest appreciates good food and has a preference for spicy dishes. His wife enjoys live piano music.

profiles.name: Diana Flores
special_requests: Child-friendly French dish or smaller portion
profiles.staff_notes: Guest appreciates authentic cuisine and dislikes pretentious plating. She is bringing her 10-year-old child who is interested in trying French cuisine.

profiles.name: Ethan Garcia
special_requests: Low-key celebration with a small candle in a dessert, no singing
Dress code suggestions
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers less sweet sauces, enjoys bourbon and fluffy pancakes with bacon

profiles.name: Fiona Hamilton
special_requests: Arrive 30 minutes earlier for drinks at the bar
profiles.staff_notes: Guest enjoys variety in the menu and prefers less sweet sauces. They also enjoy interactive dining experiences like cooking at the table.
conversation: Ask about their experience at other restaurants, discuss the variety of our menu, offer to explain the preparation of our dishes

profiles.name: Gabriella Ingram
special_requests: Acknowledgement of nephew's scholarship achievement, possibly a card or note from the staff
profiles.staff_notes: Guest has shown appreciation for knowledgeable staff and unique food twists. However, she has had a negative experience with slow service in the past.

profiles.name: Hank Johnson
special_requests: Table with enough aisle space for a cane
profiles.staff_notes: Guest's partner uses a cane. Ensure they have enough space to move comfortably without disturbing others.

profiles.name: Iliana Kay
special_requests: Small mention or a custom dessert message like 'Congrats on College'
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers dishes that are not overly sauced. Enjoys craft beer and hearty meals.

profiles.name: Jake Lee
special_requests: Small note on the dessert plate saying 'Baby on the Way'
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers homemade and fresh ingredients, had a bad experience with fish in the past

profiles.name: Laura Maxwell
special_requests: Dessert sampler or half portions of different desserts
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers well-seasoned food and rich, not heavy, dishes. She had a negative experience with under-seasoned curries and watery lassi at another restaurant.

profiles.name: Michelle Norton
special_requests: Brunch-style items on the dinner menu
profiles.staff_notes: Guest appreciates passionate and knowledgeable staff, and timely service especially with coffee refills.

profiles.name: Nora Owens
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers meals without shellfish or fish sauce. Ensure to provide attentive service as guest had a previous experience with indifferent service at another restaurant.
conversation: Guest enjoys deli food, particularly Reuben sandwiches and pickles. Discuss our deli options.

profiles.name: Oscar Patel
profiles.special_occassion: Oscar Patel is planning to propose during the meal and has requested for a small string quartet to play one song
special_requests: Small string quartet to play one song during the meal
profiles.staff_notes: Oscar Patel enjoys steak cooked to order and appreciates wine recommendations. He has had negative experiences with sushi in the past due to vinegary rice and less fresh fish.

profiles.name: Penelope Quinn
special_requests: Dine at 6 PM and finish by 7:30 PM
profiles.staff_notes: Guest is attending a theater performance after dinner. Ensure prompt service to avoid delay.
conversation: Ask about the theater performance they are attending

profiles.name: Ronald Rogers
special_requests: Suggest a full-bodied red wine to pair with the boeuf bourguignon
profiles.staff_notes: Guest's wife is a wine lover. Ensure the wine pairing is perfect.

profiles.name: Sophie Sullivan
special_requests: No cilantro in any dishes or garnish
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers spicy food and enjoys sweet potato fries. Ensure toppings are evenly distributed in dishes.
conversation: Discuss the guest's previous dining experiences, ask about their preference for spicy food

profiles.name: Thomas Vickers
special_requests: Light dinner, more desserts
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers well-cooked couscous and flavorful dishes. His wife has a preference for desserts. They might skip heavier main courses for multiple desserts.

profiles.name: Ursula Wood
special_requests: Low-sodium meals
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers thin-crust pizza with a tangy marinara sauce. She appreciates fresh ingredients and is not a fan of overly sauced dishes. She also values helpful staff.
conversation: Ask about her experience at Pizza Pop and her preference for thin-crust pizza

profiles.name: Victor Xu
special_requests: Present a small gift with dessert
profiles.staff_notes: Guest appreciates knowledgeable staff and clean environment. Pay attention to the quality of grilled dishes.

profiles.name: Winnie Yee
special_requests: Potential addition of a third seat
profiles.staff_notes: Guest prefers well-prepared vegan dishes and appreciates knowledge about local produce suppliers. Had a negative experience with overcooked steak and bland salad.

profiles.name: Ximena Zhao
special_requests: Swap dairy-heavy courses in the tasting menu
profiles.staff_notes: Guest's partner is lactose intolerant. Ensure to provide alternatives that don't compromise the overall experience. Guest appreciates experimental flavors and is understanding of busy periods but values efficient service.
